pull.title: Combine common error strings for different options so translations can be shared and reused

events.message: Combine common error strings for different options so translations can be shared and reused

issue.title: Tracking: Backport upstream network encapsulation
issue.body:
This is to track the backporting of various upstream PRs leading up to the goal of the P2P network encapsulation:

issue.title: [Init] Combine common error strings so translations can be shared
issue.body:
Backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7257

Adds helper methods for common translatable string outputs during init, end result is that the number of strings sent to Transifex is reduced/standardized.

Based on top of #1375 

Conflicts with #1373 (this to be rebased after both #1373 and #1375 are merged)

issue.title: net: Split DNS resolving functionality out of net structures
issue.body:
Backport of bitcoin/bitcoin#7868

Also includes bitcoin/bitcoin#7257 for some trivial conflicts.

Commits in stack order:
- pick d39f5b425d8fc1bf3b7f33d35625ffd8d7a3cd77
- pick 367569926a9b15c05ba8d56c554880b8f5614f71
- pick 5e109225aede0333a9c58915d8a92ea98a00c45b - from bitcoin/bitcoin#7257
- pick a98cd1fc86eac1e5e5a09830028233dbce1dae70
- pick e9fc71e5fa6f0d7991bac616b9fed6a80e77a8d7
